about_the_game:
[About the game]

All text in this game was translated by machine translation.

[About the DLC.]

This DLC content is an additional episode of "Sex-Loving Family".

・「Fuyuka After Story」
・「Hidaka family, pregnant woman, 4P after-sex」※Select "After Story" from the title screen.

In order to play this DLC, you must have the full version of "Sex-Loving Family" installed on your computer.


[Story]
Fuyuka Hidaka still regrets what happened at the summer resort.
Her family's mood is gloomy because of what happened due to her own actions.
Fuyuka, who has a hard time going home, happens to see Shogo in town, and when she follows him, she finds...


[CHARACTER]

Name: Fuyuka Hidaka
Height: 158 cm
Three sizes: 94/57/88
Characteristics: sassy, violent, foul-mouthed

Second daughter of Arisa. She is a rebellious, sassy, foul-mouthed, and quick with her hands.
She has a complex about her mature older sister and consciously plays up her childishness.


Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)

◆Game Specifications◆

Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection



◆Content warning◆

This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

Games containing nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, sexual activity with pregnant women
Contains general adult content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

short_description: After the resort. We will continue to train Fuyuka. Fuyuka is a game to make her a sex slave of the main character completely. Please enjoy the process of training her little by little.
